high_descs: Turn around and go near the desk.
Take the tissuebox from the table.
Put the tissue near the desklamp.
The desklamp will be glow by using the tissue.
anns.task_desc: To glow the DeskLamp using the TissueBox.

high_descs: Move straight and turn left towards the desk.
Pick the tissuebox from the cardboard box in the table.
Turn on the desklamp on the table.
anns.task_desc: Turn on the DeskLamp on the table while taking the TissueBox

high_descs: Turn around turn right go straight to the coffee  table
take the tissue on the coffee table
Turn around  go straight walk near to the desk lamp
Examine a tissue by the light of a tall lamp.
anns.task_desc: Examine a tissue by the light of a tall lamp.
